author: psharples
msg: New tasks added for signing release artifacts.

Refactored the sub-project builds to use different configurations as defined in the local ivy.xml files. Only the 'publish-maven-release-artifacts' task found in ivy-java-common actually uses the pgp signing task, but now the configurations for publishlocal, publish-snapshot and publish-stagingarea are separated out from each other.  TODO - add this functionality to sign the build found in the release ant script. (At present there is just a batch file to do this)

author: cziegeler
msg: IP clearance for Felix diagnostic services

author: julianfoad
msg: Update calls to three deprecated APIs to use svn_client_get_repos_root()
instead, mark the deprecated APIs as such and move their implementations to
(svn_client_get_repos_root): Mention that it may open a temporary RA

author: alexparvulescu
msg: JCR-2959 SQL2 QueryEngine should use Lucene for sort
- removed redundant 'reversed' info, as lucene is already reversing the comparator
- added option to enable the feature from the SQL2OrderByTest test
